import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";

import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Update inventory action"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/inventory/actions/{InventoryActionId}/update"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Updates an existing inventory action record.

**Note**: This API is marked as deprecated (v1.0).

**Updatable Fields**:
- `Quantity` - The quantity delta
- `UnitCost` - Unit cost for the transaction
- `Description` - Notes about the action
- `ActionDate` - When the action occurred
- `RelatedEntityId` - Link to a different entity

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"InventoryActionId","in":"path","required":true,"description":"Unique identifier of the inventory action to update.","schema":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":true,"description":"Updated inventory action data.","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","description":"Request body for creating or updating an inventory action. Contains all fields from the InventoryAction model.","properties":{"InventoryActionId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Unique identifier of the action (required for updates, generated on create)."},"GroupKey":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","nullable":true,"description":"Optional key for grouping related actions together."},"InventoryActionTypeId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Identifier describing the type of action."},"InventoryId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Identifier of the stock entry to affect."},"RelatedEntityTypeId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","nullable":true,"description":"Identifier describing the related entity type."},"RelatedEntityId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","nullable":true,"description":"Identifier of the related entity (e.g., ticket)."},"ActionDate":{"type":"string","format":"date-time","description":"When the action occurred."},"Quantity":{"type":"integer","description":"Quantity delta to apply (negative for consumption, positive for addition)."},"UnitCost":{"type":"number","format":"double","description":"Unit cost recorded for the transaction."},"Description":{"type":"string","nullable":true,"description":"Optional description or notes about the action."}},"title":"UpdateInventoryActionRequest"},"example":{"Quantity":-2,"UnitCost":40,"Description":"Updated - additional part needed"}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Inventory action updated successfully.","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","description":"Response envelope for updating a single inventory action.","allOf":[{"type":"object","description":"Response envelope returned after successfully updating a resource. Based on C# `ItemUpdateResponse<T>` from `Spark.Shared.Models.Responses`.","properties":{"Id":{"type":"integer","description":"Legacy numeric identifier (if applicable)","example":0},"Uid":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"UUID of the updated resource"},"Item":{"type":"object","description":"The updated entity","nullable":true,"additionalProperties":true},"UserToken":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","nullable":true,"description":"Authenticated session identifier"},"RequestDate":{"type":"string","format":"date-time","description":"Timestamp when the API processed the request"},"ExecutionTime":{"type":"number","format":"double","description":"Server-side execution time in milliseconds"},"StatusCode":{"type":"integer","description":"HTTP status code (typically 200 for successful update)","example":200},"Message":{"type":"string","nullable":true,"description":"Optional informational message"},"ErrorKey":{"type":"string","nullable":true,"description":"Machine-readable error key for client-side error handling"},"ServerName":{"type":"string","description":"Application node that processed the request"},"ProcessId":{"type":"integer","description":"Internal process identifier for diagnostics"},"OperationId":{"type":"string","nullable":true,"description":"Trace identifier for log correlation"},"Properties":{"type":"object","additionalProperties":true,"nullable":true,"description":"Additional metadata properties"}},"required":["StatusCode"],"title":"ItemUpdateResponse"}],"properties":{"Item":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"The InventoryActionId of the updated action."}},"title":"InventoryActionUpdateResponse"}}}},"404":{"description":"Inventory action not found."}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
